para.text: The following fees are established by the Board:
Initial Clinical examination — $100 (An initial exam applicant shall submit to the Board the application fee, initial clinical examination, and completed application.);
Inactive status (one-time fee) — $25 (no fee required if placed on inactive status by the Board for failure to submit required CEUs);
Verification of Maryland licensure to another state or jurisdiction — $25.
Fees for the theory examination shall be $100 or less as set by the Board-approved testing service.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§8-201, 8-205, 8-206, and 8-6B-01—8-6B-29, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .02B amended effective June 20, 1994 (21:12 Md. R. 1061)
Regulation .04A amended effective June 20, 1994 (21:12 Md. R. 1061)
Regulations .01—.06, Continuing Education, repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted under new chapter, Fees, effective June 20, 2005 (32:12 Md. R. 1047)
Regulation .01B amended as an emergency provision effective August 18, 2011 (38:19 Md. R. 1146); amended permanently effective October 17, 2011 (38:21 Md. R. 1279)
Regulation .01B amended effective August 19, 2013 (40:16 Md. R. 1344); May 20, 2019 (46:10 Md. R. 490)
